document_data.mainbody:
ikemens Folly, sometimes misnamed as Pikemans Folly, was a trade route that ran between the city-state of Hlondeth and the city of Ormath in the Shining Plains of the Vilhon Reach.
Pikemens Folly was constructed in the , boosting trade between the City of Serpents on the Vilhon Reachs northern shores and the Shining Plains. By the , Pikemens Folly became a major caravan route, making the city of Lheshayl the center of commerce in the Shining Plains and Ormath prospered on supplying steeds for the traveling merchants. These horses were in high demand and the famous Plainsteeds of the Shining Plains traveled and could be found in many places along the Pikemens Folly, from Lheshayl to Riatavin in the west.
